item.title: Singtel has launched new mobile plans that include HBO content
item.description:
Singtel has launched three innovative “XO” postpaid mobile plans, the first to offer premium entertainment as part of the package. These new XO plans are designed to provide both generous data allowances and significant handset discounts, offering customers the best of both worlds. Additionally, XO plans include an HBO GO subscription, giving customers access to top-tier video entertainment. The XO 78 Plan provides customers with 30 GB of data, 300 minutes of talk time, 300 SMS messages, and a 24-month HBO GO subscription for S$78 per month...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-has-launched-new-mobile-plans-that-include-hbo-content/
